masteryButtons.classDescription: A warrior from the north who has seen the horrors of war first hand, the Primalist seeks communion with the power of Eterra, the power of the earth.
You are the master of the wilds and the beasts that dwell within. The heart of the wild beats within you, its fury leading your way.
passiveBonuses: You and your minions deal 50% increased melee damage

masteryButtons.classDescription: Your strikes bear power, avalanches that shatter mountainsides, the lightning that cracks the sky open. You are the storm.
passiveBonuses: +50% elemental resistance while you control a totem

masteryButtons.classDescription: You are the avatar of the latent power of the earth. Your form malleable to that power, Eterra's bastion against all that would threaten her.
passiveBonuses: When leaving a transformed state, you gain 70% damage reduction for 2 seconds

nodeList.altText: Each point of strength increases armour by 4% and improves skills that rely on the raw strength of you and your companions, such as Swipe and Summon Wolf.

nodeList.description:
When you kill a frozen enemy, a random totem is healed to full, has its duration refreshed, and its damage is permanently increased. 

This damage increase is doubled for cold damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you kill a frozen enemy a random totem is healed to full, has its duration refreshed and its damage is permanently increased by [10%] per point. The damage bonus is doubled for cold damage.

node.nodeDescription: +[30%] freeze rate multiplier per point for you and your minions

GeneralTooltop.body: You must have this many points in your Base Class to put points into any Mastery Class. Reaching this point does not unlock your Mastery Classes
GeneralTooltop.title: Mastery Threshold
